PAC_PORT_INVALID_REAUTH_TIMER_TEST.desc: PAC configuration with invalid re-auth timer in PAC_PORT_CONFIG table.
PAC_PORT_INVALID_REAUTH_TIMER_TEST.eStr: reauth period value must be in range of 1-65535.

PAC_PORT_INVALID_MAX_USERS_TEST.desc: PAC configuration with invalid max users in PAC_PORT_CONFIG table.
PAC_PORT_INVALID_MAX_USERS_TEST.eStr: max users per port value must be in range of 1-48.

PAC_WITH_VALID_VALUES.desc: PAC configuration for MAB user and authentication mechanism.
